## Dataset

```{r}
library(dplyr)
metadata <- readxl::read_excel(here::here('data', 'GLNE07samples_baxter.xlsx'))
nrow(metadata)
metadata %>% 
    group_by(Diagnosis) %>% 
    summarize(n = n())

metadata %>%
    filter(Diagnosis != 'Pending', !is.na(Diagnosis)) %>% 
    mutate(Diagnosis = recode(Diagnosis,  
                              `High Risk Normal` = 'Normal')
           ) %>% 
    group_by(Diagnosis) %>% 
    summarize(n = n())
```
